Other than the whole Rosie the Riveter meme, I took a class on WWI/WWII. At the end we did presentations of a research project. In the class two vets, my ana retired Navy guy... This twit, a hyper feminist from the Fairhaven College, did hers on how the REAL victims of WWII were female factory workers, forced to give up jobs to returning veterans. Most insane drivel ever. If I was the Prof I would have failed her right there.
